tool.name: SAGA.ta_hydrology.22
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySLOPE False isArrayAREA False output_data_LS $output_data_LS name SAGA.ta_hydrology.22 SLOPE $SLOPE AREA $AREA CONV $CONV METHOD $METHOD EROSIVITY $EROSIVITY STABILITY $STABILITY prefer $prefer response $response outputType_LS $OutputSection_LS.outputType_LS transmissionMode_LS $OutputSection_LS.transmissionMode_LS

param.name: SLOPE
param.label: Slope
param.help: Slope The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: AREA
param.label: Catchment Area
param.help: Catchment Area The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: CONV
param.label: Area to Length Conversion
param.help: Derivation of slope lengths from catchment areas. These are rough approximations! Applies not to Desmet & Govers' method.
param.option: no conversion (areas already given as specific catchment area)

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_LS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_LS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calculation of slope length (LS) factor as used by the Universal Soil Loss Equation (USLE), based on slope and specific catchment area (SCA, as substitute for slope length).
